name: Minesweeper+ (Onox)
description:
Minesweeper+ is a logic game where your goal is to flag all mines and reveal all fields without detonating any mine. Minesweeper+ allows you to customize color of the blocks and the background and height and width of the field. Minesweeper+ for now has three upgradable power-ups:
Coins - give you more money, the value of each coin can be upgraded
Shields - protect you from exploded mine, the probabilty of finding a shield
can be upgraded
Eyes - if found reveals mines in short radius, the probabilty of finding an eye
can be upgraded
